title: Here are 8 things you can do with your old laptop
description: The last place any laptop should go is the dump.

title: Android 14 beta 5 is here, the last beta before the stable launch
description: The final version of Android 14 will launch in the coming weeks.

title: Would you spend $130,000 on a car without Android Auto?
description: The move likely has to do with GM's plans to generate revenue from software-as-a-service products.

title: Hate link spam in YouTube Shorts? Google is disabling all user links soon.
description: The links will still be there, but you won't be able to click them.

title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic review: Giving the people what they want, mostly
description: A traditional spin on a familiar device.

title: Gboard could soon let you use generative AI for proofreading and emojis
description: These features are currently hidden behind experimental flags, but could be soon released to the public.

title: Xiaomi’s next Mi Band is basically a stripped-down Apple Watch
description: Like the look of the Apple Watch but want something much cheaper for fitness tracking? This could be for you.

title: These leaked renders give us a good look at Bose’s QuietComfort Ultra range
description: What we are looking at are some design changes on the headphone, but practically no change on the earbuds.

title: Galaxy S24 series tipped to get Exynos power alongside display and RAM upgrades
description: Tons of Galaxy S24 info just leaked and we've got mixed feelings about it.

title: Touchscreens are horrible to use in the rain, but OnePlus has a solution
description: The OnePlus Ace 2 Pro will gain a 'Rain Water Touch' feature, making for a less frustrating experience in a downpour.

title: One UI 6, based on Android 14, now available in beta for Galaxy S23 series
description: As usual, you'll need to join this beta under the assumption that many things won't work correctly.

title: Apple is changing the way iPhone users hang up calls
description: The unmissable red "end call" button is being repositioned between other buttons, and we bet it will cause frustration.

title: Your Android phone will now tell you if someone has planted an AirTag on you
description: Update: Google's unknown tracker alerts are now available on Android to check for unwanted tracking.

title: Disney Plus joins Netflix in password sharing crackdown, hikes prices
description: US customers will also have access to a new ad-free bundled subscription plan.

title: Nest Thermostat vs Nest Learning Thermostat: Which should you buy?
description: It's hard to go wrong with either, but always check compatibility with your home's wiring.
